p: Impurities such as soluble Fe, Al, and Cu are generally precipitated first as hydroxides [ 72, 127, 145, 146, 147, 148, 149, 150]. Recupyl recovered copper through cementation on steel shots [ 46], whereas Weng et al. suggested precipitating copper as CuS (s) with Na 2S [ 149]. Nan et al. extracted copper by solvent extraction with aldoxime-based extractant, which is very selective over cobalt and lithium [ 151].
